name: Rina Clicker: School Idle Festival
description:
In the second episode of Gyakuten Live!, Invitation to the Turnabout, Tennoji Rina mentioned a little game called "Rina Clicker". Now, Rina Clicker: School Idle Festival is here!

Share your boards with everyone in sight! Unlock 16 friends to help you on your journey! Discover 229 upgrades to power up your board empire!

Also check out Gyakuten Live!

https://krakelak.itch.io/gyakuten-live

Known bugs:

- Occasionally, buying a friend level or upgrade with just enough boards causes the counter to roll over to 999.999 Duodecillion for a short moment. The problem resolves itself right away. Due to its relative non-intrusiveness, this is a low priority error.
